snippet: It would be the first major oil company explore for natural gas and oil in shale rock in that country.
abstract: French oil company Total is poised to become first major oil company to explore for natural gas and oil in shale rock in Great Britain, only Western European country that has encouraged such exploration.
lead_paragraph: It would be the first major oil company explore for natural gas and oil in shale rock in that country.

headline.main: France Oil Giant Is Expected to Seek Shale Gas in Britain
headline.print_headline: France Oil Giant Is Expected To Seek Shale Gas in Britain
